title: No Pixel 4 in India?????????? Why why why??? Unacceptable!!!!
content:
I read about the Soli chip issue but seriously why not launch Pixel 4 in India same as they are doing in Japan. Why why why why why????
This is so unfair!!!! 
I've been waiting months to replace my old Nexus 6P. 

ðŸ˜­

Can someone please tell me how to escalate this to Google. I refuse to accept this!!!!!
